        public ProjectList()

    • Method Detail

      • getActivityList

        public static java.util.Collection<ActivitySummary> getActivityList(java.lang.String pid,
                                                                    TeamMember tm)
        Gets the List of activities the user can and can't view, edit using a LRU caching mechanism. The pid is used as the cache key.
        Parameters:
        pid - current pagination request reference (random id) to keep a snapshot for the pagination chunks
        tm - TeamMember, current logged user
        Returns:
        the Collection with the list of activities for the user

      • getActivityList

        public static java.util.Collection<ActivitySummary> getActivityList(TeamMember tm)
        Builds full project list of activities with clarification on rights to edit for the given team member
        Parameters:
        tm - the team member
        Returns:
        the list with a short JSON description for each activity

      • getEditableWorkspacesForActivities

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Set<java.lang.Long>> getEditableWorkspacesForActivities(TeamMember tm)

      • getViewableActivityIds

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getViewableActivityIds(TeamMember tm)
        Gets the list of ids of the activities that the logged user can view.
        Parameters:
        tm - Logged teamMember
        Returns:
        the List of ids of the activities that the logged user can view.

      • getActivitiesByIds

        public static java.util.List<ActivitySummary> getActivitiesByIds(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> activityIds,
                                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Set<java.lang.Long>> activitiesWs,
                                                                 TeamMember tm,
                                                                 boolean include,
                                                                 boolean viewable)
        Returns all AmpActivityVersions from AMP that are included/excluded from the activityIds parameter
        Parameters:
        include - whether to include or exclude the ids of the List activityIds into the result
        activityIds - List with the ids (amp_activity_id) of the activities to include or exclude
        activitiesWs -
        viewable - whether the list of activities is viewable or not
        Returns:
        List of the activities generated from including/excluding the List of activityIds

      • getActivityInProjectListFormat

        public static ActivitySummary getActivityInProjectListFormat(AmpActivityVersion a,
                                                             boolean editable,
                                                             boolean viewable)
        Transforms and activity into Project List format
        Parameters:
        a - the activity
        editable - true if it can be edited in the current workspaces
        viewable - true if it can be viewed from any user workspace
        Returns:
        JsonBean representation of the activity in Project List format

      • getTranslatableFieldValue

        public static MultilingualContent getTranslatableFieldValue(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                            java.lang.String fieldValue,
                                                            java.lang.Long parentObjectId)
        Gets a object containing the values for requested languages. In fact the method returns a Map, where the key is the code of the language and the value in that language. The keys (languages) is a reunion of language codes containing the default_locale, language parameter and translations parameter.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - name of the field
        fieldValue - value of the object
        parentObjectId - the object id of the activity
        Returns:
        MultilingualContent with translated values
